Class Command

java.lang.Object
Command
public class Command
extends java.lang.Object
A class in which each object represents a command.

    • Command

      public Command​(java.lang.String commandName, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> validArgs, int minArgNum, int maxArgNum, java.util.function.Function<java.util.List<java.lang.String>,​java.lang.String> functionPointer)

      Parameters:
      commandName - String representing the command user should enter to call this command

      functionPointer - A method reference representing which function should be called.

    • runMethod

      public java.lang.String runMethod​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> args)
      Runs the method using the arguments passed
      Parameters:
      args - List of Strings representing the arguments that should be passed into the command
      Returns:
      String which is returned from the command in GameLogic

    • correctCommandAndArgs

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> correctCommandAndArgs​(java.lang.String input)
      Gets the input and checks whether the input is in the correct format for this command (i.e. correct command and arguments)
      Parameters:
      input - String representing the player's input
      Returns:
      List of Strings representing the command and its arguments
